# Roman History

## Augustus Caesar (Octavian)

Adopted some of Julius Caesar, assinated in 44BC.

Defeated Mark Anthony and Cleopatra in maritime battle of Actium 31BC

Title Augustus conferred in 27BC by Roman Senate

## Tiberius Caesar

Succeeded Augustus in 14AD

## Caligula 

Succeeded Tiberius in 37 AD but was mentally unstable

## Claudius

Rose to power in 41 AD and invaded Britian in 43AD

Expelled Jews from Rom in 29 AD

## Nero

Came to power in 54 AD as 17-year old stepson of Claudius

Blamed Christian for Great Fire of Rome in 64AD.

Paul and Peter were executed by Nero during the Romano-Jewish war of 66 AD

## Vespasian

Came to power in 68AD after Nero's suicde

## Titus

Came to power in 79AD. Destroyed the Temple in Jersulamen in 70 AD to end Jewish war
